dragons-and-dice.title: Dragons and Dice
dragons-and-dice.description: Dragons and Dice is an online board game inspired by George R.R. Martins extremly popular fantasy novels A song of Ice and Fire and the popular television series Game of Thrones. The game is designed to mimic the traditional form of a tabletop boardgame. The goal of the game is to arrive at the end of the board first! To play please select your charcter below, then your opponent

image.name: dragonsanddice-portfolio.jpg
image.alt: Screenshot of Dragons and Dice page

holidaze.title: Holidaze
holidaze.description: Holidaze is a tourism agency based in Bergen that provides a platform to find local accomodations. This project requires you to create both the visitors side and the administration side. That means there has to be a searchable page where customers can make enquiries, as well as administration tools for the hosts.

spacex.title: SpaceX
spacex.description: The assigment was to create a microsite for SpaceX with the focus on their mission to get to mars to make life multiplanetary

re-cycle.title: Re-cycle
re-cycle.description: Website for a bike tourism company situated in Oslo. Re-cycle was founded with a vision of a more dynamic and enviormentally friendly way to travel.The goal for the site is to promote their bike tours in Oslo

winterick.title: Winterick
winterick.description: Winterick is a winter sports club for children and young adults. They offer a wide range of activiites and events.

science-museum.title: Science Museum
science-museum.description: Homepage for community homepage. School assigment finished in 2018.

red-pepper-pizza.title: Red Pepper Pizza
red-pepper-pizza.description: Red Pepper Pizza is a local italian Pizza Restaurant. The project was to create a website that would fit with their theme and image

image.name: red-pepper-pizza-portfolio.jpg
image.alt: Screenshot of Red Pepper Pizza page

deconest.title: DecoNest
deconest.description: DecoNest is a home interior store, focusing on luxury items of high quality
